summary_promot:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Metadata:
            - Document Title: Foothills Walkthrough
            - Section Title: Mantis-Catching Swamp
            - Sub-Section Title: Yaoguai Chief - Emerald-Armed Mantis

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "# Foothills Walkthrough

This will include Hound, Jackal, and Eagle Soldiers, as well as the tougher looker variants with shields called Captain of the Court.

As you get closer to the first Keeper's Shrine of the area, you'll see a large group of soldiers appear. Clear these out and then you can activate the shrine.

Be sure to check the Shrine Shop while you're here, and revisit the Zodiac Village to see what new items everyone has to offer.

Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop
| Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop            | Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop              | Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop            | Mount Huaguo Shrine Shop       |
| ----------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | ------------------------------ |
| Body-Cooling Powder (x6) - 180 Will | Shock-Quelling Powder (x6) - 180 Will | Tonifying Decoction (x3) - 360 Will |                                |
| Mind Core (x6) - 3000 Will          | Find Gold Thread (x2) - 3000 Will     | Celestial Ribbon (x1) - 9000 Will   | Gold Tree Core (x1) - 4500 Wil |


Now drop down from the Feng-Tail General and activate the nearby Keeper's Shrine. You'll see a field straight in front of you that's strewn with soldiers and fire. Before you head here, let's go find the second optional Poison Chief miniboss that's nearby.


As you get close to the edge of the cliff, you'll find another clearing with a rock in the middle. This is the third Poison Chief in the region.

When you've beaten the third Poison Chief, head over to the start of the red trees. As you enter the clearing with the lightning, you'll find the next Keeper's Shrine on the left.


When it's defeated, head back along the river and look for the golden tree.

## Mantis-Catching Swamp

Now that you've cleaned up the majority of the optional bosses, it's time to find the last of the main bosses. You need to have defeated the Feng-Tail General, Gold Armored Rhino, and Cloudtreading Deer before you can take on the Emerald-Armed Mantis.

The golden tree will have a slight fog around it when you're able to fight the Emerald-Armed Mantis. Zoom toward the fog and you'll see that it glistens with green speckles. As you land by it a cutscene will begin.

### Yaoguai Chief - Emerald-Armed Mantis

Transformations are also useful here, and we found that Red Tides proved handy once again. The mantis is susceptible to burn damage, so it will chip away at its health bar while you follow up with attacks.

When the mantis is dead, you'll receive Dian-Cui Loong-Soaring Bracers. With all the main bosses finished, for now, it's time to follow Zhu Bajie up the mountain. On the way though, there are just two more optional bosses to capture to wrap up this portion of the Chapter."
            - Following Text: "From the Mantis-Catching Swamp, fly up and back toward the area where you fought the Gold Armored Rhino and Cloudtreading Deer. We now want to stop on the left, to get the Son of Stones, which is the boss sitting at the edge of the cliff on the left with the neon blue glow."

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
            3. Incorporate any relevant metadata (e.g., section or document titles) to improve coherence, **but do not assume any domain-specific knowledge** unless explicitly stated.
            4. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.



            Output Format:
            Preceding Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the preceding text that gives context to the image.
            Image Summary:
            Provide a summary of the image, describing its purpose and content based on the context.
            Following Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the following text that elaborates on the information related to the image.
img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:  
The preceding text provides a walkthrough of the "Foothills" area, focusing on defeating optional minibosses and progressing toward the main boss, the Emerald-Armed Mantis. Players are guided to locate the golden tree surrounded by fog, which signals the start of the boss fight. The mantis is vulnerable to burn damage, and defeating it rewards players with the Dian-Cui Loong-Soaring Bracers.

Image Summary:  
The image depicts a dark, forested swamp area with a body of water and rocky terrain. A red arrow highlights a specific location, likely pointing toward the area where players can encounter the Emerald-Armed Mantis boss. The setting aligns with the "Mantis-Catching Swamp" section, emphasizing the environment's role in guiding players to their next objective.

Following Text Summary:  
The following text directs players to move from the Mantis-Catching Swamp toward the areas where the Gold Armored Rhino and Cloudtreading Deer were defeated. The next goal is to locate the Son of Stones, an optional boss positioned near a cliff with a neon blue glow. This marks the continuation of the chapter's progression.
